title: Ajahn Brahm`s Dhamma Talks - Part 02 -  25 Talks (almost 30 hour
description:
Ajahn Brahm Dhamma Talks - almost 30 hours & 29 Talks about buddhist wisdom and every dag problems.

Ajahn Brahm teaches us how to deal with difficult emotions and to learn how to experience more positive emotions, more often. 

Do we have a right to believe anything? Do some beliefs have priority over others? How do beliefs arise in the mind and how accurately do such 'intellectual fermentations' actually mesh with an Ultimate Reality? 

This is for all thinking people! Enjoy!  


NB!

You can go to youtube and search for "ajahn brahm" and you can enjoy some of the best talks on video. This buddhist monk is wery importent in our world today!
So mail a talk to a friend, a talk you think that he/she would enjoy...

"Om Mani Padme Hum"


Pease for all mankind!

With love from Alf inge Fredriksen
